404.description: Please check the URL in the address bar and try again.
404.title: Hindi mahanap ang pahina
apps.lead: Ang pinakamahusay na paraan upang makapagsimula sa Mastodon ay sa pamamagitan ng aming mga opisyal na app para sa iOS at Android, pero maraming third-party na app ang available din sa ibaba.
apps.title: Apps
browse_apps.make_your_own: Ang Mastodon ay open-source at may eleganteng, well-documented na API na available sa lahat. Gumawa ng sarili mong app, o gumamit ng isa sa maraming third-party na app na ginawa ng ibang mga developer!
browse_apps.page_description: Mag-browse ng mga opisyal at third-party na app para sa desentralisadong social network na Mastodon.
browse_apps.you_can_use_it_from_desktop: Maaari mong palaging gamitin ang Mastodon mula sa browser sa iyong desktop o telepono! Maaari itong idagdag sa iyong home screen at sinusuportahan pa ng ilang browser ang mga push notification, tulad ng isang native na app!
covenant.learn_more: All servers listed here have committed to the <link>Mastodon Server Covenant</link>.
footer.quip: Free, open-source decentralized social media platform.
home.features.audience.body: Ang Mastodon ay nagbibigay sa iyo ng isang natatanging posibilidad na pamahalaan ang iyong madla nang walang middleman. Ang Mastodon na naka-deploy sa sarili mong imprastraktura ay nagbibigay-daan sa iyo na sundan at sundan mula sa anumang iba pang server ng Mastodon online at nasa ilalim ng walang sinumang kontrol kundi sa iyo.
home.features.audience.title: Build your audience in confidence
home.features.moderation.body: Mastodon puts decision making back in your hands. Each server creates their own rules and regulations, which are enforced locally and not top-down like corporate social media, making it the most flexible in responding to the needs of different groups of people. Join a server with the rules you agree with, or host your own.
home.features.moderation.title: Moderating the way it should be
home.features.self_expression.body: Mastodon supports audio, video and picture posts, accessibility descriptions, polls, content warnings, animated avatars, custom emojis, thumbnail crop control, and more, to help you express yourself online. Whether you're publishing your art, your music, or your podcast, Mastodon is there for you.
home.features.self_expression.title: Unparalleled creativity
home.features.timeline.body: Mas alam mo kung ano ang gusto mong makita sa iyong home feed. Walang mga algorithm o ad na mag-aaksaya ng iyong oras. Subaybayan ang sinuman sa anumang server ng Mastodon mula sa isang account at tanggapin ang kanilang mga post sa magkakasunod na pagkakasunud-sunod, at gawing mas katulad mo ang iyong sulok ng internet.
home.features.timeline.title: Stay in control of your own timeline
home.hero.body: Ang iyong feed sa bahay ay dapat mapuno ng kung ano ang pinakamahalaga sa iyo, hindi kung ano ang iniisip ng isang korporasyon na dapat mong makita. Kakaibang social media, i-balik sa kamay ng mga tao.
home.hero.headline: Social networking na hindi binebenta.
home.page_description: Alamin pa tungkol sa Mastodon, ang lubhang kakaiba, libre at open-source na desentralisadong social media platform.
home.sponsors.body: Ang Mastodon ay libre at open-source na software na binuo ng isang non-profit na organisasyon. Direktang sinusuportahan ng pampublikong suporta ang pag-unlad at ebolusyon.
home.sponsors.title: Independent always
home.testimonials.title: What our users are saying
home.why.decentralized.copy: Napakahalaga ng instant na pandaigdigang komunikasyon upang mapabilang sa isang kumpanya. Ang bawat server ng Mastodon ay isang ganap na independiyenteng entity, na kayang makipag-interoperate sa iba upang bumuo ng isang pandaigdigang social network.
home.why.decentralized.title: Desentralisado
home.why.interoperability.copy: Built on open web protocols, Mastodon can speak with any other platform that implements ActivityPub. With one account you get access to a whole universe of social appsâ€”the fediverse.
home.why.interoperability.title: Interoperable
home.why.not_for_sale.copy: We respect your agency. Your feed is curated and created by you. We will never serve ads or push profiles for you to see. That means your data and your time are yours and yours alone.
home.why.not_for_sale.title: Not for Sale
home.why.opensource.copy: Mastodon is free and open-source software. We believe in your right to use, copy, study and change Mastodon as you see fit, and we benefit from contributions from the community.
home.why.opensource.title: Open Source
home.why.title: Why Mastodon?

roadmap.lead: This is a glimpse into what we're working on and what we're planning to work on.
roadmap.page_description: Learn what we are working on in Mastodon
roadmap.title: Roadmap
server.filter_by.category.lead: Some providers specialize in hosting accounts from specific communities.
server.filter_by.region.lead: Where the provider is legally based.
servers.getting_started.feed.body: With an account on your server, you can follow any other person on the network, regardless of where their account is hosted. You will see their posts in your home feed, and if they follow you, they will see yours in theirs.
servers.getting_started.feed.title: Your feed
servers.getting_started.flexible.body: Find a different server you'd prefer? With Mastodon, you can easily move your profile to a different server at any time without losing any followers. To be in complete control, you can create your own server.
servers.getting_started.flexible.title: Flexible
servers.getting_started.headline: Getting started with Mastodon is easy
servers.getting_started.safe_for_all.bod: We can't control the servers, but we can control what we promote on this page. Our organization will only point you to servers that are consistently committed to moderation against racism, sexism, and transphobia.
servers.getting_started.servers: The first step is deciding which server youâ€™d like to make your account on. Every server is operated by an independent organization or individual and may differ in moderation policies.
servers.hero.body: Mastodon is not a single website. To use it, you need to make an account with a providerâ€”we call them serversâ€”that lets you connect with other people across Mastodon.
servers.page_description: Find where to sign up for the decentralized social network Mastodon.
sorting.name: Alphabetical
sponsors.build_the_social_web.body: Weâ€™re looking for developers to help build the future of online communities with Mastodon. Thereâ€™s a lot to do â€” we need help with new features, scaling operations, improving documentation, and more â€” but the work doesnâ€™t stop here. We contribute to the decentralized social media protocol underlying Mastodon, ActivityPub, and collaborate with the social web community that uses it. Join the social web revolution!
sponsors.build_the_social_web.title: Build the social web
sponsors.donate.body: All donations go directly to Mastodon's development and operation. Recurring donations help us plan for the long term. We're forever grateful for every dollar we receive â€” Thank you!
sponsors.donate.corporate_matching.copy: Does your company provide corporate matching? If so, you can use Benevity to donate!
sponsors.donate.corporate_matching.title: Corporate Matching
sponsors.donate.corporate_sponsorship.co: We welcome corporate sponsors! Sponsorship includes your companyâ€™s logo with a link to your website.
sponsors.donate.footer.donor_policy: To ensure you qualify to make a donation, please refer to our donor policies: <link_mastodon_inc>Mastodon, Inc</link_mastodon_inc> <middot></middot> <link_mastodon_ggmbh>Mastodon gGmbH</link_mastodon_ggmbh>
sponsors.donate.github.copy: GitHub Sponsors receive a Mastodon badge to their Org or Personal profile. Plus we donâ€™t pay fees!
sponsors.donate.github.title: GitHub
sponsors.donate.patreon.copy: Patreon donors gain access to <emphasis>Mastodonâ€™s Discord</emphasis> for developers, server admins, and social web supporters.
sponsors.donate.patreon.title: Patreon
sponsors.donate.title: Donate today
sponsors.donate_direct.givebutter.copy: Are you an American resident? If so, you can make a tax deductable donation using Givebutter.
sponsors.donate_direct.givebutter.title: Direct
sponsors.donate_direct.stripe.copy: Direct donations are very welcome and it's easy to do using Stripe. A direct donation also makes for a great gift.
sponsors.donate_direct.stripe.title: Direct
sponsors.hero.body: We develop and maintain software for the decentralized social web. No billionaires or mega-corporations here â€” we rely entirely on your support.
sponsors.hero.title: Reimagining online discourse
sponsors.how_we_use_donations.body: Donations go towards software development, paying essential contributors like web developers, mobile app developers, and designers. Your donations also support legal and marketing expenses to advocate for and raise awareness about the social web and Mastodon. Additionally, we operate the two largest Mastodon servers, maintained through financial and in-kind contributions. For details, take a look at our latest annual report.
sponsors.how_we_use_donations.title: How we use donations
sponsors.page_description: Donate or become a sponsor and help us build the social web for everyone!
sponsors.sponsorship.statement: Sponsorship does not equal influence. Mastodon is fully independent.
sponsors.support_us.body: Weâ€™re rebuilding social media so everyone can build healthy communities locally, connect globally, and own their online presence. As a nonprofit we lead development of Mastodon. Weâ€™re part of a vast network of organizations building on social web technology. Together, weâ€™re retaking the digital town square for the people. Help us build the social web for everyone.
sponsors.support_us.title: Support us
stats.disclaimer: Data collected by crawling all accessible Mastodon servers on {date}.
verification.examples.lead: Anyone can use verification on Mastodon, but here are just some of the most recognizable names that doâ€¦
verification.examples.title: In the wild
verification.features.how_to.body: Put a link to your Mastodon profile on your website or webpage. The important part is that the link has to have a rel="me" attribute on it. Then edit your Mastodon profile and put the address of your website or web page in one of your four profile fields. Save your profile, that's it!
verification.features.how_to.title: Here's how
verification.features.no_badge.body: Identity is not a yes or no question. There are few truly unique names in the world, so why should only the famous ones get a "yes"? At Mastodon, we don't rely on legal names and blue badges. Instead, we rely on the fact that people can be identified by their official websites.
verification.features.no_badge.title: There is no blue badge
verification.lead: Verifying your identity on Mastodon is for everyone. Based on open web standards, now and forever free.
verification.page_description: Learn how to get verified on Mastodon
verification.title: Verification on Mastodon
verification.why.decentralization.body: There is no need to trust a central authority. The verification can be manually confirmed anytime.
verification.why.decentralization.title: Decentralized
verification.why.equality.body: You do not have to be a celebrity to verify your identity. You just need to have a website or web page.
verification.why.equality.title: For everyone
verification.why.privacy.body: You do not need to submit your documents anywhere, so there is no chance of them being leaked.
verification.why.privacy.title: Privacy-friendly
wizard.error: Oops, something went wrong. Try refreshing the page.
wizard.no_results: Seems like there are currently no servers that fit your search criteria. Mind that we only display a curated set of servers that currently accept new sign-ups.
